FIRST_BLOOD.event_description: Triggered when you kill the first champion.

CHAMPION_KILL.event_description: Triggered when you kill a champion.

PENTA_KILL_ENEMY_TEAM.event_description: Triggered when enemy team player kill 5 champions.

DRAGON_KILL.event_description: Triggered when you kill or assist a dragon kill.

STOLE_DRAGON.event_description: Triggered when you steal or assist a dragon steal.

STOLE_DRAGON_ENEMY_TEAM.event_description: Triggered when enemy team steal the dragon from your team.

BARON_KILL.event_description: Triggered when you kill or assist the baron kill.

STOLE_BARON.event_description: Triggered when you steal or assist a baron steal.

STOLE_BARON_ENEMY_TEAM.event_description: Triggered when enemy team steal the baron from your team.

ACE_MY_TEAM.event_description: Triggered when enemy team steal the baron from your team.

ACE_ENEMY_TEAM.event_description: Triggered when enemy team steal the baron from your team.
